title: Rewriting Bases
text: To solve, write both sides of the equation in terms of powers of $$5$$.

title: Square Root
text: The square root corresponds with a fractional exponent.

title: Writing $$\sqrt{2}$$ in terms of powers of $$2$$
text: What is $$\sqrt{2}$$ in terms of fractional powers of 2?

title: Shared Bases
text: If the bases of exponents are the same, the exponents can be equated to solve for variables within the exponents.

title: One-To-One Property
text: For two exponents with the same base to be equal, their exponents must be equal to each other.
